mapper.sql: where status = 1 and ptime >= #{ctime} and (broadcast = 1 or broadcast = 0 and find_in_set(recipient, #{uid})) and id not in (select mid from msg_state where uid = #{uid})
mapper.insert: insert into msg (title, content, type, cid, cname, ctime, pid, pname, ptime, wid, wname, wtime, status, broadcast, recipient) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{cid}, #{cname}, #{ctime}, #{pid}, #{pname}, #{ptime}, #{wid}, #{wname}, #{wtime}, #{status}, #{broadcast}, #{recipient})
insert into msg_state (mid, uid, time) values (#{mid}, #{uid}, #{time})
mapper.select:
select * from msg where 1
order by id desc
mapper.update: update msg set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, type=#{type}, pid=#{pid}, pname=#{pname}, ptime=#{ptime}, wid=#{wid}, wname=#{wname}, wtime=#{wtime}, status=#{status}, broadcast=#{broadcast}, recipient=#{recipient} where id = #{id}
update msg set status=#{status}, wid=#{wid}, wname=#{wname}, wtime=#{wtime} where id = #{id} and status = 1
mapper.delete: delete from msg where id = #{id} and status = 0
mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.content, a.type, a.pname, a.ptime from msg a join msg_state b on a.id = b.mid where b.uid = #{uid} order by a.id desc

select id, title, content, type, pname, ptime from msg
order by id desc
